attributes.action: respect our pride to be British and want our government to teach our children about British history, culture and values in every corner of this great country as a matter of the utmost priority. No matter what your colour, creed or race we all benefit from this wonderful country. We have a duty to teach our children to respect and appreciate the people who have helped build, protect and sacrificed their life for the benefit of all people who inhabit our Great Britain.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
